info.title: Condition Type for Pricing in Purchasing â€“ Read
info.description: This inbound service enables external applications to read data of condition types that are used for pricing in Purchasing. You can query each entity in this service to retrieve the corresponding business data.

x-sap-shortText: Read condition types that are used for pricing in Purchasing using this synchronous inbound service

Condition Type for Pricing in Purchasing

get.summary: Reads descriptions of all condition types in the system.
get.description: Reads descriptions of all condition types for pricing in Purchasing in different languages.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads a specific condition type description.
get.description: Reads the description of a specific condition type for pricing in Purchasing, which the consumer specifies by passing "A" as condition usage, "M" as condition application, condition type, and language code.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads the condition type for a specific condition type description.
get.description: Reads the data of the condition type for pricing in Purchasing for a specific condition type description. Consumers must pass "A" as condition usage, "M" as condition application, condition type, and language code.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads all condition types in the system.
get.description: Reads data of all condition types for pricing in Purchasing.

get.description: Reads a specific condition type for pricing in Purchasing, which the consumer specifies by passing "A" as condition usage, "M" as condition application, and condition type.

get.summary: Reads the description of a specific condition type.
get.description: Reads the condition type description from a specific condition type for pricing in Purchasing, which the consumer specifies by passing "A" as condition usage, "M" as condition application, and condition type.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_PurgPrcgCndnTypeText HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
